mapper.select: select site_id from lt_ebay_listing where store_id = #{storeId} and is_active = 1 group by site_id
SELECT s.ga_track_id FROM `lt_ebay_listing` `t` inner join lt_store s on t.store_id=s.id where t.ebay_listing_id = #{ebayListingId}
